src:
Marko Marinović: Najvažnije je da pobeđujemo kod kuće
Borac nastavlja borbu u domaćoj ligi, Tamiš naredni izazov

03 Nov 2019

U poslednjem susretu 5. kola KLS – a košarkaši Borca će na svom parketu ugostiti ekipu Tamiša (nedelja, 19 časova).
Ovaj meč dolazi nakon fenomenalnog izdanja pulena Marka Marinovića u susretu sa Rogaškom. Na tom meču Čačani su pokazali sav svoj raskošni talenat i potencijal. Takođe, na taj način su napravili sjajnu uvertiru za utakmicu domaćeg prvenstva protiv Tamiša.
Treba pomenuti i to da je trijumf nad Rogaškom bio dvadeseti od kada je Marinović seo na klupu Borca. Ako se ima u vidu da su za to vreme pretrpljena samo dva poraza, od reprezentacije Srbije i MZT – a, stvara se utisak da je Borac na odličnom putu da ostvari sve svoje ambicije.
Susret protiv Tamiša biće treći od ukupno pet, koliko će Borac u kontinuitetu igrati na parketu dvorane kraj Morave.
,,Već smo se polako privikli da igramo u paklenom ritmu. Dve utakmice nedeljno postale su naš standard. Doduše, imali smo sreću da je raspored odlučio da igramo čak pet vezanih utakmica kod kuće, što je zaista dobro, jer ne moramo dodatno da se umaramo dugačkim putovanjima. Dva duela smo već pobedili, ostala su još tri, a prvi na redu je Tamiš“, rekao je trener Marinović.
Šef struke Čačana naglašava da se u dvorani kraj Morave samo trijumf računa.
,,Još pred početak ove sezone sam naglasio, a to se ne menja ni sada, da nam je glavni cilj da sve utakmice kod kuće pobedimo. Neće biti lako, ali tek je početak. Ne mogu da se žalim, idemo korak po korak“, dodao je mladi stručnjak.
Pred meč sa gostima iz Pančeva, kormilar Borca poručuje:

,,Ne bežimo od uloge favorita kod kuće, što smo do sada često naglašavali. Samo odgovoran pristup utakmici može doneti dobar rezultat. A ako odigramo na nivou dosadašnjih izdanja, pobeda ne bi trebalo da dolazi u pitanje“.

Kao i uvek, Marinović poziva publiku u pomoć.
,,Posećenost na utakmici sa Rogaškom bila je nešto veća nego inače, na čemu se zahvaljujem vernim navijačima. Takođe, čačanski osnovci su taj meč posetili u velikom broju, što je meni posebno drago. Nadam se da će to postati lepa praksa i da će ubuduće dolaziti svaki put”, završio je Marko Marinović.
I naredne dve utakmice Borac igra u Čačku, dolaze Sutjeska pa Dunav.

KOŠARKAŠKA LIGA SRBIJE – 5. KOLO

PetakDunav – Mladost Zemun 89:95/Kovačević 20 - Bibins 21/
SubotaOKK Beograd - Novi Pazar 79:80/Musić N. 27 - Vulić 21/
Zlatibor - Sloboda 94:85/Papić 25, Popović 15 (10 sk, 16 as) - Tadić 21, Nikolić 19/
Napredak - Dinamik 71:62/Ilkić 18 - Pašajlić, Glas 11/
Vršac - Metalac 79:71/Biler 19 - Stepanović 20/
Kolubara - Vojvodina 94:91/Simić 24 - Simović 22/

Nedelja


19.00: Borac – Tamiš





Pišu: Đurđe Mečanin/Nikola Minović



Djurdje.mecanin@mozzartbet.com
text:
Marko Marinovic: The most important thing is to win at home
Fighter continues fight in domestic league, Tamis next challenge

03 Nov 2019

In the last match of the 5th round of KLS, Borac basketball players will host a team of Tamis on their floor (Sunday, 7 pm).
This match comes after the phenomenal release of Marko Marinovic's Pulen in a match with Rogaska. In that match, the people of Cacak showed all their magnificent talent and potential. They also made a great overture for the home game against the Tamis.
It should also be mentioned that the triumph over Rogaška was the twentieth since Marinovic sat on the bench of Borac. Bearing in mind that during this time only two defeats were suffered, from the national team of Serbia and MZT, it gives the impression that Borac is on a great path to achieve all its ambitions.
The match against Tamis will be the third of five that Borac will continuously play on the floor of the hall near Morava.
"We are already slowly getting used to playing at a hellish pace. Two games a week have become our standard. Admittedly, we were fortunate that the schedule decided to play as many as five tied games at home, which is really good, as we don't have to get tired of the long trips. We have already won two duels, there are three more, and the first is Tamis, "said coach Marinovic.
The chief of the Cacana profession points out that only a triumph counts in the hall near Morava.
"Before the start of this season, I emphasized, and that doesn't change now, that our main goal is to win all the games at home. It won't be easy, but it's just the beginning. I can't complain, let's go one step at a time, "the young expert added.
Before the match with guests from Pancevo, the skipper of Borac says:

"We do not run away from the role of favorites at home, which we have often emphasized so far. Only responsible approach to the match can bring good results. And if we play at the level of releases so far, victory should not be questioned. "

As always, Marinovic calls on the audience for help.
"The attendance at the game with Rogaška was slightly higher than usual, which I thank the loyal fans. Also, the Čačak elementary schools have visited this match in large numbers, which I am particularly pleased with. I hope it will become a good practice and that it will come every time in the future, ”concluded Marko Marinovic.
And for the next two games Fighter plays in Cacak, Sutjeska and Danube are coming.

SERBIA BASKETBALL LEAGUE - ROUND 5

FridayDunav - Mladost Zemun 89: 95 / Kovacevic 20 - Bibins 21 /
SaturdayOKK Belgrade - Novi Pazar 79: 80 / Music N. 27 - Vulic 21 /
Zlatibor - Sloboda 94: 85 / Papic 25, Popovic 15 (10 sk, 16 as) - Tadic 21, Nikolic 19 /
Progress - Dynamic 71: 62 / Ilkic 18 - Pasajlic, Voice 11 /
Vrsac - Metalac 79: 71 / Biller 19 - Stepanovic 20 /
Kolubara - Vojvodina 94: 91 / Simic 24 - Simovic 22 /

Sunday


7.00pm: Fighter - Tamish





By: Djurdje Mecanin / Nikola Minovic



Djurdje.mecanin@mozzartbet.com
